name: Duplexer
description: Duplexer is a challenging single-player puzzle platformer game. The player can push or pull the walls, floor and ceiling around them to overcome many puzzling, platforming and physics based trials.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP3 (32-bit only), Windows Vista, or Windows 7 Processor: 2.0+ GHz processor Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: SM3-compatible video card DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10 Processor: Intel i3 or above Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA 8000 series or higher graphics card DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 500 MB available space
